aboutMePhrase: As a recent graduate in Web Development, I am passionate about creating impactful, user-focused websites and applications. My expertise spans both front-end and back-end, with a greater focus on Java and MySQL, supported by a solid foundation in design and teamwork principles.

studies1.title: Higher Technician in Digital Design and Web Development
studies1.description: Gained proficiency in essential programming languages and successfully developed various projects. My focus was primarily on Java and Spring Boot, along with MySQL for database management and HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for front-end development. Additionally, I worked with version control tools like Git and GitHub, and explored deployment processes using Azure.

studies2.title: Bachelor's Degree in Stage Design and Scenography Technology
studies2.description: Completed a four-year program focused on designing and collaborating on theater projects. Developed expertise in design, production, and team leadership within a creative environment.

studies3.title: Intermediate Level French Language Certification
studies3.description: Achieved a B2 level in French through studies at the Instituto de Idiomas de la Universidad de Sevilla.
studies3.site: Instituto de Idiomas de la Universidad de Sevilla

studies4.title: Advanced Level English Language Certification
studies4.description: Attended a bilingual program in Granada and reached a C1 level in English.

work1.title: NTT DATA Internship
work1.description: Completed a 3-month dual internship program at NTT DATA as a Junior Web Developer, where I gained hands-on experience in web development and team collaboration.

work2.title: Crew Leader at Veganitessen
work2.description: Led a team at Veganitessen, managing daily operations and ensuring excellent service in a fast-paced hospitality environment.

work3.title: Stage Designer at Wallahye Productions
work3.description: Contributed to creative stage designs and managed the technical execution of projects as part of a collaborative production team.

reference4.title: Joaquín Borrego
reference4.description: Web Development Degree Tutor at Vedruna

success-message: Thank you for your message! I’ll get back to you as soon as possible.
